title: MongoDB Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix’s MongoDB certification course will get you familiar with MongoDB and arm you with the necessary skills to start using this database to power your application. With training designed and led by MongoDB consultants, you’ll be furnished with the knowledge to build solutions to complex development. You’ll gain proficiency in everything from installation to configuration, monitoring, backups, security, scaling out, and performance tuning with practical examples. Get started with this MongoDB training today to become a certified and full-time MongoDB developer.
prerequisites: What are the Prerequisites for  MongoDB Training?MongoDB training includes a curriculum that covers all the basics required. But it is recommended to have prior fundamental knowledge on database management concepts like basic CRUD operations, ability to understand system programming, basics of JavaScript programming and blueprint of software application development.
instructor_bio: Having 9+ years of experience working closely with industry, Shekar is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged MongoDB, Microservices, springboot and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.
review|1|review: I completed my MongoDB Training. I personally feel that it is the right place to embark on a successful MongoDB career. The trainer had covered each and every topic with real-time scenarios. I shall definitely recommend it to my friends and colleagues. Thanks to the trainer and Mindmajix Team.
review|2|review: I have received training in MongoDB from Mindmajix and everything worked out well for me. Great trainer and training material and a really good project. I have got valuable knowledge here in MongoDB and gave me a lot of confidence.
review|3|review: I have taken MongoDB Training from Mindmajix. Trainer taught all the real time concepts thoroughly and very informative.
review|4|review: I took my online training for MongoDB from Mindmajix. I must say the course content was highly reliable and the trainer covered even the slightest of concept. Amazing trainer, highly interactive sessions, great examples, what not! I got everything that is required to become an expert in MongoDB. Good job Mindmajix.
content:

short_description: Learn MongoDB Course ➔ Gain Skills Required to Become a MongoDB Certified Professional

title: MarkLogic Training
description: This hands-on MarkLogic Training is for developers, administrators, and architects who are aiming to build a successful career in MarkLogic technology. The online course is designed to teach you the core fundamentals as you explore what MarkLogic is, how to install and configure MarkLogic, database creation, data modelling, loading and querying data, and database connection via programming interfaces. Also, you’ll be provided with a downloadable virtual machine that contains all the software, examples, and instructions needed to complete the labs. When you’re finished with this MarkLogic certification training, you’ll be able to use MarkLogic to solve real-world data integration challenges
prerequisites: Are there any prerequisites for taking up this MarkLogic Training Course?There are no prerequisites for this MarkLogic training course, but it’s helpful to have working experience with databases and any programming language.
content: ['Introduction to MarkLogic', 'MarkLogic Installation', 'Database Creation', 'Data Modelling', 'Inserting Data into a Database', 'Serving Data', 'Introducing Search', 'Learning More About Capabilities']
